column4: Can anyone help? I've just about had enough of the hassle - been battling with it now for hours and hours.   Last step is sling the pc into the garden.

Hi all. hope someone can help me. I've installed raid 0 using alternate cd. Built raid drive ok. got to end of install where I'm sposed to not reboot but to reinstall grub. problem is, all commands are not recognised. its lke its lost the path maybe.  Anyone got any idea's?
I figure you tried this, but does help work? (Not being rude, serious question)
